```{r}
library("dplyr")
library("ggplot2")
library("tidyverse")
library("tidytext")
```


```{r}
# Import
dataset <- read.csv("./datasets/tcc_ceds_music.csv")


View(dataset)
# Tidy
tidy_dataset <- dataset %>% 
  select(artist_name, 
         track_name, 
         release_date, 
         genre, 
         lyrics, 
         len)


View(tidy_dataset)
write.csv(tidy_dataset, "./datasets/tcc_ceds_music_tidy.csv", row.names = TRUE)
```
